sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html' }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { verific: boolean = false constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { this.verificAutentificacion() } verificAutentificacion(): boolean { const localStore = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ApplicationData')!) if (localStore) { if (localStore.message === 'Token generado correctamente.') return this.verific = true } return this.verific = false } }
